text: A July 2020 letter purportedly sent by the Ohio State Bar Association (OSBA) was accurate in stating that any retailer or manufacturer — including those operating from homes — could be sued for selling or creating COVID-19 protective face masks that were not medically approved, defective, or without proper labeling.
entity_strings: COVID-19, OSBA, Ohio State Bar Association, face masks
entities: ['COVID-19', ' OSBA', ' Ohio State Bar Association', ' face masks']

text: Several claims about Covid-19 including face masks, vaccines and unapproved treatments
